abstract: Actors play couple in "Cymbeline" getting married for real this weekend
snippet: Actors play couple in "Cymbeline" getting married for real this weekend
lead_paragraph: Jessie Austrian and Noah Brody play a married couple in Fiasco Theater's Off Broadway production of "Cymbeline," at the Barrow Street Theater. On Sunday they're getting married for real, with other members of the cast in the wedding party.
